entities.name: crookshanks

relationships.description: Harry and Sirius are sitting at the table.
Mr. Weasley is supervising knives chopping meat and vegetables.
Mrs. Weasley is stirring a cauldron over the fire.
Mundungus is talking to Harry about a business opportunity.
Crookshanks has jumped onto Sirius's lap and curled up.
Sirius scratched Crookshanks behind the ears.
